title: Congress to observe Black Day today
title_page: Congress to observe Black Day today - Worldnews.com
text:
The Andhra Pradesh Congress Committee has given a call to party workers, sympathisers and public to observe November 8, the day Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced demonetisation a year ago, as a Black Day.
The poor and middle class were the worse hit by the economic upheaval that followed the scrapping ₹500 and
